physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:102 x 145 mmCondition:The print is in good condition, though the mounting paper is heavily foxed and crumbling. There are two roughlycircular patches of staining left of centre in sky area.Foliation:‘15’Process:Silver gelatin

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View of Hormuz Island from on board ship. An imposing fort, likely that of Fort of Our Lady of the Conception, also known as the Portuguese Castle (shown in Photo 49/1/12), is visible in the centre background.Craggy hills rise in the background.Inscriptions:Ink, below image: 'Distant View of Hormuz.'Pencil, lower right, alongside image: ‘15’Pencil, upper left, alongside image: ‘a’
